alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 2:51PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Nassau and southwestern Camden Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 251 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kings Ferry, or near Hilliard, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Hilliard, Yulee and Kings Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
